remarks: Define the class of all undirected multigraphs.  A multigraph is a pair ` <. V , E >. ` where ` E ` is a function into subsets of ` V ` of cardinality one or two, representing the two vertices incident to the edge, or the one vertex if the edge is a loop.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
statement:
df-umgra $p |- UMGrph = { <. v , e >. | e : dom e --> { x e. ( ~P v \ { (/) } ) | ( # ` x ) <_ 2 } } $.
$d e v x $.
